price: 163. Hij heeft geen deelgenoten. En dit is mij bevolen en ik ben de eerste van de moslims."
arabic: لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُۥۖ وَبِذَٰلِكَ أُمِرۡتُ وَأَنَا۠ أَوَّلُ ٱلۡمُسۡلِمِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: lā sharīka lahu wabidhālika umir'tu wa-anā awwalu al-mus'limīna
